'''Duncan Muggoch''' is the Line Producer who supervised filming locations in Croatia in [[Season 4]] and Croatia and Spain in [[Season 5]] of ''[[Game of Thrones]]''. 

Prior to Game of Thrones he has worked on many feature films and televsion shows such as:Â ''Thor- The Dark World, Jack the Giant Killer, Salmon Fishing in the Yemen, The Wolfman, The Bourne Ultimatum, Stardust, The Da Vinci Code'' and the HBO movie ''RKO 281''
